name: 文森：G4人偶事件｜Vincent: Phantom of the G4
name_original: 文森：G4人偶事件｜Vincent: Phantom of the G4
description:
!!!Please Read Page Description Before Downloading!!! What is this game?

What you see here is the prototype of “Vincent: The Secret of Myers” created in 2017. Due to popular demand, I have decided to upload it to itch.io. It is a game created with RPG Maker MV and is currently only available in Simplified Chinese.

Do you have any plans to translate this game?

I am not sure at the moment, but I am leaning more towards No. I am personally not a big fan of this game myself, and it was not originally part of my plan to make it available to download. Don’t get me wrong, the game does have pros as well! However, I believe it no longer represents my characters and myself.

Is the game still canon?

No. Although I did make a few references to this game in “Vincent: The Secret of Myers” for the older fanbase, the game is no longer canon. I see the current“Vincent: The Secret of Myers” as the revamped version of this game.

Do you allow reuploads of your game?

No. If you have “Vincent: Phantom of G4” shared in your group chat or on your personal drive, please take it down! The only games that I allow reuploading at the moment are fan-translated versions of Therapy with Dr. Albert Krueger. Thank you for your understanding!

And remember, please check out Vincent: The Secret of Myers before downloading this game! !!!Please Read Page Description Before Downloading!!!
